q: Steve Ballmer announced the latest changes Wednesday in an e-mail to Microsoft employees. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," Steve Ballmer wrote. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. Steve Ballmer also disclosed that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. "Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase

interviewed Sirius Radio host, Howard Stern . During the interview, Mr. Howard Stern commented that he doesn't like Jay Leno of NBC's Tonight Show and doesn't understand why his ratings are higher than David Letterman 's. America must be filled with morons, he said about Jay Leno 's fans who tune in every night. "I don't like Jay Leno personally," Howard Stern said.
